Name: 't Nieuwe Kaf√©

Name: 't Nieuwe Kaf√©

Name: 't Nieuwe Kaf√©
Review Text: Almost all restaurants near hotspots in every big European city don't deliver. 'T Nieuwe Kafé is not one of them. The food, drinks and atmosphere are all equally good and the view of the beautiful Damsquare is just the icing on the cake. Highly recommended.

Name: 't Nieuwe Kaf√©

Name: 't Nieuwe Kaf√©

Name: 't Nieuwe Kaf√©
